scenes.video_summary: Weary commuter at rainy bus stop discovers sleek SunVue case in messenger bag, curiosity replacing exhaustion
scenes.audio_summary: Melancholic piano builds from single notes to hopeful melody over rain ambience and discovery sound effects

00:00-00:02.visual: Hero/Main Commuter (28-year-old professional woman with shoulder-length dark brown hair, olive skin, grey wool coat damp from rain) stands under concrete bus stop shelter at Urban Street with Bus Stop on dreary morning. She checks phone with squinting tired eyes, shoulders hunched against drizzle. NOT wearing any sunglasses - face fully visible showing exhaustion. Worn leather messenger bag on shoulder. Cracked sidewalk puddles reflect overcast sky. Light rain creates fine mist in air, breath vapor visible in cold morning.
00:00-00:02.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium shot at eye level, subject center-frame. Lens & Depth: 50mm standard lens, f/2.8 shallow depth creating soft bokeh. Camera motion: Subtle handheld drift, documentary feel. Composition: Foreground: rain puddles on concrete. Midground: Hero centered under shelter. Background: blurred wet street with dim storefronts. Lighting: Key light: flat overcast daylight from above. Fill light: soft bounce from wet pavement. Rim light: none. Practical lights: distant streetlamp glow. Style: Modern documentary, desaturated grey-blue grade, natural film grain. Mood: Weary and mundane
00:00-00:02.sfx: phone notification ping, distant car horn, footsteps on wet pavement
00:00-00:02.ambience: steady rain pattering on metal shelter roof, distant traffic hum creating urban white noise
00:00-00:02.music: sparse melancholic piano, single note every 2 seconds, 60 BPM, very muted volume

00:02-00:04.visual: Hero/Main Commuter at Urban Street with Bus Stop sighs and tucks phone in pocket, then opens worn leather messenger bag to search inside. Hands visible rummaging through bag interior, fingers pushing aside items. NOT wearing any sunglasses - face shows mounting frustration with furrowed brow. Rain continues steadily, droplets visible on bag surface. Grey wool coat sleeve damp as arm reaches deeper into bag.
00:02-00:04.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium close-up tilting down to hands and bag. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.8, focus shifts to bag. Camera motion: Slow tilt down following action. Composition: Foreground: bag flap. Midground: hands searching. Background: soft shelter wall blur. Lighting: Same overcast key light, bag interior darker. Fill from pavement. Style: Documentary aesthetic continues. Mood: Building frustration
00:02-00:04.sfx: bag zipper opening, items rustling inside, keys jingling
00:02-00:04.ambience: rain continues steady, bus engine approaching in distance
00:02-00:04.music: piano adds second note creating minor interval tension, slightly louder, ducks under dialogue

00:04-00:06.visual: Hero/Main Commuter discovers sleek SunVue Sunglasses Case (matte black leather with embossed logo) tucked in bag corner. Fingers pause on case, tracing embossed SunVue logo with surprise. Expression shifts - eyes widen, slight head tilt of curiosity. NOT wearing any sunglasses - full face visible showing intrigue. Case catches subtle light creating soft sheen on leather surface. Rain patters steadily outside shelter.
00:04-00:06.cinematography: Camera shot: Insert shot of case in hand. Lens & Depth: 85mm portrait lens f/2.0 for shallow focus. Camera motion: Slow push-in 2cm/sec toward case. Composition: Foreground: soft bag edge. Midground: case prominent in hand. Background: creamy bokeh. Lighting: Key light catches case surface from above-left. Style: Documentary with emerging warmth. Mood: Surprise shifting to curiosity
00:04-00:06.sfx: soft leather texture sound as fingers explore case, subtle magnetic closure click
00:04-00:06.ambience: rain softening slightly, distant bus engine fading
00:04-00:06.music: piano adds hopeful major third note, creating chord progression, building anticipation

00:06-00:08.visual: Hero/Main Commuter at bus stop lifts SunVue Sunglasses Case to eye level, examining with growing interest. Thumb begins pressing case clasp to open (motion continues to next scene). NOT wearing any sunglasses - face fully visible showing emerging hope, slight smile forming. Case prominent in frame with logo clearly visible. Background shows wet street beginning to lighten subtly. Rain continues but feels less oppressive.
00:06-00:08.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium shot returning to face with case. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.8 maintaining face sharpness. Camera motion: Slight upward drift following case. Composition: Foreground: case lower third. Midground: Hero's hopeful face. Background: shelter and street. Lighting: Subtle warm highlight emerging on face. Style: Documentary with hope emerging. Mood: Curiosity building to anticipation
00:06-00:08.sfx: case clasp beginning to click open, fabric rustle from coat movement
00:06-00:08.ambience: rain continues but lighter, approaching footsteps of another commuter
00:06-00:08.music: piano melody completes phrase but sustains final note, preparing seamless transition, no hard stop

visual_effect.name: Innerlight
visual_effect.description: A radiant glow builds from within the lenses, shining through. Feels powerful or magical—perfect for smart glasses or transformations
visual_effect.timing: 4-6 seconds as aviators slide onto face

Rain continues but lighter, creating gentle atmosphere.
